title: Printing from Bash on Ubuntu on Windows (CUPS Print Spooler)
body: It would be great to be able to print from WSL using the familiar lp command, as one does in ordinary Linux. I've tried installing and starting CUPS, but am having problems doing so. Having a means of printing, whether using CUPS itself, or emulating CUPS by connecting it somehow to the Windows printing system, would be very useful.

comments.body: Didja discover the steps necessary to get this going?
